mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (client_full_name, client_age, client_address, client_phone) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{age}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET client_full_name = #{fullName}, client_age = #{age}, client_address = #{address}, client_phone = #{phone} WHERE client_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT po.take_status AS [Take Status], o.order_date AS [Date], m.medicament_name AS [Medicament name], c.client_id AS [Client id], c.client_full_name AS [Client], c.client_phone AS [Client phone] FROM [pending_order] po JOIN [order] o ON o.order_id = po.order_id JOIN [order_medicament] om ON o.order_id = om.order_id JOIN [medicament] m ON om.medicament_id = m.medicament_id JOIN [prescription] pres ON pres.prescription_id = om.prescription_id JOIN [client] c ON pres.client_id = c.client_id WHERE po.take_status = 'Не взято' OR po.take_status = 'Взято с опозданием'

SELECT m.medicament_name AS [Medicament], o.order_date AS [Order date], po.availability_date AS [Availability date], c.client_id AS [Client id], c.client_full_name AS [Client], c.client_phone AS [Client phone]
FROM [pending_order] po JOIN [order] o ON o.order_id = po.order_id JOIN [order_medicament] om ON o.order_id = om.order_id JOIN [medicament] m ON m.medicament_id = om.medicament_id JOIN [prescription] pres ON pres.prescription_id = om.prescription_id JOIN [client] c ON pres.client_id = c.client_id WHERE po.employeee_cooking_id IS NULL AND po.take_status = 'В ожидании'

SELECT top 10 res.Quantity as [Quantity], cl.client_id AS [Client id], cl.client_full_name AS [Client] from (select COUNT(c.client_id) as [Quantity], c.client_id AS [Client] FROM [order_medicament] om JOIN [medicament] m ON m.medicament_id = om.medicament_id JOIN [prescription] pres ON pres.prescription_id = om.prescription_id JOIN [client] c ON pres.client_id = c.client_id
WHERE LOWER(m.medicament_name) = LOWER(dbo.DeleteDoublуSpace(#{name})) group by c.client_id ) as res JOIN [client] cl ON res.Client = cl.client_id ORDER BY res.Quantity DESC

SELECT top 10 res.Quantity as [Quantity], cl.client_id AS [Client id], cl.client_full_name AS [Client] from (select COUNT(c.client_id) as [Quantity], c.client_id AS [Client] FROM [order_medicament] om JOIN [medicament] m ON m.medicament_id = om.medicament_id JOIN [prescription] pres ON pres.prescription_id = om.prescription_id JOIN [client] c ON pres.client_id = c.client_id
WHERE LOWER(m.medicament_type) = LOWER(dbo.DeleteDoublуSpace(#{type})) group by c.client_id ) as res JOIN [client] cl ON res.Client = cl.client_id ORDER BY res.Quantity DESC
